definition: to prevent and cure/prevention and cure
to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research

sentences.english: Part 4 Liao River Basin Water Pollution Prevention recommendations to improve the legal system.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分是遼河流域水污染防治。

sentences.english: The potential of oils as new types of larvicides for the control of mosquitoes are explored.
sentences.chinese: 這兩種油品可開發用作防治蚊蟲的新型殺幼蟲藥劑。

sentences.english: Objective To study the preventive and therapeutic effects of Migu granule on osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究密骨顆粒對骨質疏鬆症的防治作用。

sentences.english: Conclusion Tibetan compound prescription of XD shows certain therapeutic and preventive effect on plateau erythrocythemia.
sentences.chinese: 藏藥新三果湯對高原紅細胞增多症有一定的防治作用。

sentences.english: The period after anthesis to bagging was the key period in chemical control.
sentences.chinese: 藥劑防治的關鍵時期是花後至果實套袋前。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effectiveness of health education on HIV/AIDS-related knowledge, attitude, and performance (KAP) in Jianghua Yao Autonomous County.
sentences.chinese: 目的對江華縣開展艾滋病防治健康教育進行效果評價。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the treatment of axillary deformity caused by post-burn cicatricial contracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腋部瘢痕攣縮的防治方法。

sentences.english: The prospect of biocontrol in the future was discussed for plant disease in greenhouse.
sentences.chinese: 最後對生物防治在棚室中應用前景進行了探討。

sentences.english: To study 20 years disease control effect of endemic cretinism in Guangze County.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解光澤縣地方性克汀病20年綜合防治的效果。

sentences.english: Critical time and technique of preventing wheat from sharp eyespot has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了小麥紋枯病防治關鍵時間和關鍵技術。

sentences.english: City of CDC TB Division Chen Xiubing doctor said.
sentences.chinese: 市疾控中心結核病防治科陳秀兵醫師說。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical effects of fortified iron nutrition on blast exposure hearing damage.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察強化鐵營養防治爆震性聾的臨牀初步療效。

sentences.english: The prevention and control of edema disease of swine were reviewed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文對豬水腫病的發病機制及防治措施進行了綜述。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the connection between clinical drugs and drug eruption as well as the prevention of drug eruption.
sentences.chinese: 探討臨牀應用藥物與藥疹發生的關係以及藥疹的防治。

sentences.english: Auto-control method was used in the experiment. 3 experiment gr…
sentences.chinese: 這對深入研究航天運動病防治方法是有益的。

sentences.english: It is considered that it is necessary to raise people's awareness of cadmium pollution and protection of ecological environment.
sentences.chinese: 提高人們加強防治鎘污染，保護生態環境的意識。

definition: to prevent/to take precautions against/to protect/to guard against/precautionary/prophylactic
to prevent and control (e.g. the spread of a communicable disease)
chronic illness/disease that takes effect slowly
